content.text: Usagihebi is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon.
Usagihebi is a mixture of a snake and a rabbit, with a white and pink snake body and rabbit ears.
Not much of its personality is known, but it appears to be friendly as it is able to form a close bond with Gaimon.
Usagihebi was the first animal Luffy and Nami encountered on the Island of Rare Animals. He was seen again with a group of animals when Gaimon waved goodbye to the departing Straw Hats.
Usagihebi, Cocox, and Lionbuta were there to witness Buggy's crash-landing on the Island of Rare Animals and the subsequent battle between him and Gaimon.

sections.title: From the Decks of the World

content.text: Usagihebi was seen watching as the new inhabitant of the island, the barrel-woman Sarfunkel, fed Gaimon some food.

elements.text: Its name is a portmanteau between the words usagi (兎, Japanese for rabbit) and hebi (蛇, Japanese for snake). This reflects its appearance as a snake with rabbit ears.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 3 Chapter 22 (p. 6) and Episode 18, Usagihebi debuts
↑  One Piece Yellow: Grand Elements (p. 245), His name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 3 Chapter 22 (p. 28) and Episode 18, Gaimon talks about being the Forest Guardian.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 3 Chapter 22 (p. 29) and Episode 18, Cocox witnesses the Straw Hats' departure.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 5 Chapter 43, cover story: Buggy's Crew Adventure Chronicles Vol. 7 and Episode 46, Cocox witnesses Buggy's crash-landing.
↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 63 Chapter 620, cover story: From the Decks of the World Vol. 7, Cocox seen two years later.
